title: Do You Want Lies With That?
featuredTitle: Do You Want Lies With That?
description: Filmmaker Declan Desmond investigates Krusty Burger. Watch Desmond eat Krusty Burger every single day and see the effects of meat that may contain monkey ass-hair.
quote: Look, I give people a meat-like burger and some kind of cola, and they still get change back from their $50.
altHero: Declan Desmond holding up a bag outside of Krusty Burger

alt3: a monkey rubbing its butt on the burger grill
